decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 0pt 1.7pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Detailed drawings and full particulars of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of the relevant parts of the works. The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</span></p><p style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 0pt 1.7pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 0pt 1.7pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">a) samples of all external&nbsp; materials; and&nbsp;</span></p><p style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 0pt 1.7pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">b) details of the proposed roof lights in the form of a manufacturerâ€™s illustration and specification.</span></p><p style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 0pt 1.7pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-01f8a906-7fff-3fa1-e96a-173534ee6200"></span></p><p style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.2; padding: 0pt 0pt 0pt 1.7pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the character and appearance of the conservation area is preserved or enhanced.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p>The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied until at least one swift brick or nesting box suitable for sparrows or starlings has been installed at the property in accordance with the manufacturer's specification. The biodiversity enhancement installed shall be thereafter retained.</p><p>REASON: In the interests of promoting biodiversity at the site.</p>
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, two storey side extension, five rooflights and increase the angle slope of the front car park
